on alfred_script(q) write_to_file(q, "/Users/fharper/.hyper_plugins/hyperalfred.txt", false) tell application "Hyper" to activate end alfred_script
on write_to_file(this_data, target_file, append_data) try tell application "System Events" to exists file target_file if not the result then do shell script "> " & quoted form of target_file set the open_target_file to open for access target_file with write permission if append_data is false then set eof of the open_target_file to 0 write this_data to the open_target_file starting at eof close access the open_target_file return true on error e try display dialog e close access target_file end try return false end try end write_to_file
